• Mayor & City Council

Mayor and City Council

Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval. Most Recent Agenda | View All Agendas and Minutes La Grange is a Home Rule Charter City with an elected Mayor and City Council. The City Manager is hired by the City Council. The Mayor is elected at large and serves a two year term. The Council consists of 8 members, each serving 2 years. The City has 4 Wards with 2 Council members from each ward. One council member is elected each year from each ward. The fiscal year runs from October 1st through September 30th. City Council Ward Map

La Grange City Council is the governing body of the City of La Grange. Regular meetings are held on the second and fourth Monday at 6 p.m. in the City Council Chambers at 155 E. Colorado Street. The public may address the City Council briefly during the Citizen Participation portion of a regular meeting after completing a request to speak form prior to the start of the meeting. City Council Mayor Jan Dockery Mayor Pro tem, Ward 1 Kathy Weishuhn Councilmember Ward 2 Ken Taylor Councilmember Ward 3 Bonnie Busch Councilmember Ward 4 Derek Smith Councilmember Ward 1 Katie Gross Councilmember Ward 2 Violet Zbranek Councilmember Ward 3 Kimberley Newton Councilmember Ward 4 Bryan Kerr

City Manager Jack Thompson

The City of La Grange conducts an officers’ election on the first Saturday in May of each year. A mayor and eight council members are elected for staggered two-year terms. Elections are held in the City Council Chambers, 155 E. Colorado.
